sentences: Linnakaitse oli tugevalt kindlustatud rünnaku korral vältimiseks.
context: Rünnaku is the genitive singular form of 'rünnak', which means attack or assault in Estonian. The '-ku' ending indicates possession or purpose, so 'rünnaku' can mean 'of an attack' or 'for defense against an attack'. In military contexts, it's commonly used to refer to defensive preparations made in anticipation of an enemy attack.
